Name: Gamma LL (1x Holographic)
Description:
Manufacturer: NV-TAC
Type: Projection 
Attachment Point: Optic
Magnification: 1x
Aim Time: +15%
Size: 1

Whether under the blazing sun or on the dark side of a moon, the NV-TAC Gamma projects an easy to see reticle to help ensure your shot finds its mark. This version of the scope includes low-light functionality suitable for operations in dim environments.
